channel.title: Weird error with equpping items
channel.description:
Hi, I need some help with a little problem with items... (Sorry if i make topics too often lets hope this is the last for today :P)
There were a few tutorials about "fixing bad equippable items" they were about to fix that you wear medhelms in your weapon slot, and your hair/beard is sticking out of it, i've tried to follow their instructions, done everything right, but some of these just wont work!
For example, bronze medhelm. (ID: 1139) As far as we know, we need to put the ID-s into the correct category. (The categories are: capes, boots, gloves, shields, hats, amulets, arrows, rings, body, legs, platebody, fullhelm, fullmask) Now, the bronze med only equips into the head slot if i put it into 'hats' category, but the hair is sticking out. So i guess i need to put it into 'fullhelm' because i think fullhelms particially remove hair so it wont stick out. I've put it in there, but the hair still sticked out, and it was worn into the WEAPON slot!!! but how the hell? Some items like bronze med, just WONT WANNA WORK! ='( I also tried fullmask. i guess the other categories wont work....
Any ideas?

item.title: Weird error with equpping items
item.dc:creator: @1337_king 1337 king
item.description:
@1337_king wrote:

[quote=“Javacisnotrecognized, post:4, topic:70292”]There isn’t a ‘category’ for some items, that was an oversight on the people who created that system. You have to program it manually, it’s part of the packetProcess method in “Player.java”[/quote]Can you detail it a bit please? Do i need to create more categories, or i need to code manually everything?

Read full topic

item.title: Weird error with equpping items
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

There isn’t a ‘category’ for some items, that was an oversight on the people who created that system. You have to program it manually, it’s part of the packetProcess method in “Player.java”

Read full topic

item.title: Weird error with equpping items
item.dc:creator: @1337_king 1337 king
item.description:
@1337_king wrote:

[quote=“Hiaburi, post:2, topic:70292”]try addding it in all the catagories that go onto your head like hat and helm[/quote]That’s what i was doing. I tried it hats, fullhelm, fullmask. other categories does not equip into head slot.

Read full topic

item.title: Weird error with equpping items
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

try addding it in all the catagories that go onto your head like hat and helm

Read full topic

item.description:
@1337_king wrote:

Hi,
I need some help with a little problem with items…
(Sorry if i make topics too often lets hope this is the last for today :P)

There were a few tutorials about “fixing bad equippable items” they were about to fix that you wear medhelms in your weapon slot, and your hair/beard is sticking out of it, i’ve tried to follow their instructions, done everything right, but some of these just wont work!

As far as we know, we need to put the ID-s into the correct category.

Now, the bronze med only equips into the head slot if i put it into ‘hats’ category, but the hair is sticking out. I’ve put it in there, but the hair still sticked out, and it was worn into the WEAPON slot!!! but how the hell?
